SELECT op_r.id, op_r.requestUrl, op_r.remoteAddr, op_r.params, op_r.method, op_r.create_time, op_r.flag, IFNULL(u.nickname, '未知') AS userName FROM sys_operating_record AS op_r LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON op_r.uid = u.id WHERE (1 = 1)
AND (op_r.requestUrl LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%') OR op_r.remoteAddr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%') OR op_r.method LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%') OR op_r.flag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%'))
ORDER BY op_r.create_time DESC

SELECT rec.method AS Na, COUNT(*) AS total, '1' AS type FROM `sys_operating_record` AS rec GROUP BY rec.method UNION ALL SELECT u.nickname AS Na, COUNT(*) AS total, '2' AS type FROM sys_operating_record AS rec1 INNER JOIN sys_user u ON rec1.uid = u.id GROUP BY u.nickname UNION ALL SELECT '未知' AS Na, COUNT(*) AS total, '2' AS type FROM sys_operating_record AS rec2 WHERE rec2.uid IS NULL OR rec2.uid NOT IN (SELECT id FROM sys_user)
